root.cn: 这是一款儿童早教学习软件，可以有效促进儿童对颜色，形状的认知，启发儿童的想象力和创造力。让爸妈陪同孩子一起玩该游戏，在游戏过程中给与指导与教育。 游戏玩法：拖动上下方物品匹配正确即胜利。提供丰富的关卡，客厅、厨房、商店、学校、动物园等，让您的孩子在不同场景中进行不停的学习！ 为孩子们提供各种不同的交通工具. 有汽车,飞机,轮船,自行车,摩托车,火箭,火车,太阳,月亮等等
root.en: This is an early childhood learning software, which can effectively promote children's cognition of color and shape, and inspire children's imagination and creativity. Let parents accompany their children to play the game, and give guidance and education in the process of the game. Game play: drag the upper and lower items match correctly to win. Provide rich checkpoints, living room, kitchen, shop, school, zoo, etc., so that your children can keep learning in different scenes! There are various means of transportation for children. There are cars, planes, ships, bicycles, motorcycles, rockets, trains, the sun, the moon and so on
